name: Advanced Lan Communicator
short_description:
iCHAT  is a real time text/voice/data based data communicator in push mode between two or more people using personal computers in the same network domain, along with shared clients. The user's text/data/voice is conveyed over a network, such as the intranet. 

This advanced instant messaging software clients also allow enhanced modes of communication, such as live voice, data file transfer, communication to mobiles, accept lan users in lists, user search, chat history, added user status.

iChat Features:-
1.	Secure Login.
2.	User Assistance in login credentials.
3.	 Registration for new users.
4.	Network Details.
5.	List of inter Domain Connected Computers.
6.	Server Connection Log.
7.	User Online list.
8.	User availability list.
9.	Chat History with deletion.
10.	Join/Host server capability.
11.	Send SMS.
12.	Send/Receive Files.
13.	User addition in lists.
14.	Communication through any port.
15.	User Last Login Details.
